content_html: Chitwan, Sept 21: The work of removing the landslide near the Tuin River under the Narayangadh-Muglin road section has started since this morning. The road section remains closed since Friday evening, after a dry landslide next to the river bridge blocked the road. The landslide debris removal work started this morni

title: Work to remove landslide debris at Tuin River bridge underway
